features.name: Appear Offline

features.name: Order Tracking
features.description: Spectate, chat with the booster, and follow your match history in the client's area.

features.name: 24/7 Support
features.description: Use our live support to receive premium help whenever you are in need.

faq.question: What is a LoL smurf account?
faq.answer: A LoL smurf account is a secondary account that experience players use to play against lower-skilled opponents. Smurfs are typically a lower rank than the player's main account, giving theme a significant advantage.
